_sText:
This map was completly made by Nate. 
I would like to thank Westsid3r for the truck (jail) idea.


**INCLUDED**
SIX jail cells.
Gun Toss.
Shot 4 Shot.
Wall for terrorist
Knife/Chicken Fight Arena.
A Place where CT's can have an overview of the main part of the map. (just go up elevator when your a ct and spawn)
A Place where t's can rebel at the beginning of map

***To Install***

Start>MyComputer>Cdrive>Steam>Steamapps>Accountname>counter-strike source>cstrike>maps

***Server Side Install***
1. Log into FTP.
2. Locate your maps folder.
3. Upload into maps folder.
Thank you!
